statements: SELECT year, tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE year = 2021
SELECT tax_rate, year FROM tax_rates WHERE tax_rate > 0.5
SELECT * FROM tax_rates WHERE tax_rate < 0.3
SELECT year, tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2020
SELECT tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE year = 2019
SELECT * FROM tax_rates WHERE year = 2021 ORDER BY tax_rate DESC
SELECT year, AVG(tax_rate) AS avg_tax_rate FROM tax_rates GROUP BY year HAVING AVG(tax_rate) > 0.1
SELECT year, tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE tax_rate BETWEEN 0.15 AND 0.25 ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT MAX(year) AS max_year, SUM(tax_rate) AS total_tax FROM tax_rates
SELECT DISTINCT year FROM tax_rates ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT * FROM historical_tax_rates WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT tax_rate, year FROM historical_tax_rates ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT predicted_tax_rate FROM predicted_tax_trends WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT year, tax_rate FROM historical_tax_rates WHERE tax_rate > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM historical_tax_rates WHERE year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2021;
SELECT * FROM historical_tax_rates WHERE year = 2020;
SELECT year, tax_rate FROM historical_tax_rates WHERE tax_rate > 0.05 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT id, year, predicted_tax_rate FROM predicted_tax_trends WHERE predicted_tax_rate < 0.1 AND year >= 2020 LIMIT 10;

SELECT t1.id, t1.year, t1.tax_rate, t2.predicted_tax_rate FROM historical_tax_rates t1 JOIN predicted_tax_trends t2 ON t1.year = t2.year WHERE t1.tax_rate > t2.predicted_tax_rate ORDER BY t1.year ASC;
SELECT MAX(tax_rate) AS max_tax_rate, MIN(tax_rate) AS min_tax_rate FROM historical_tax_rates;
SELECT * FROM tax_rates;
SELECT year, tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE year > 2015;
SELECT tax_category, tax_rate FROM tax_history ORDER BY tax_category DESC;
SELECT prediction_year, predicted_tax_rate, confidence_score FROM tax_predictions WHERE prediction_year = 2020;
SELECT year, AVG(tax_rate) AS avg_tax_rate FROM tax_history GROUP BY year ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_rates WHERE year IN (2019, 2020, 2021) ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT prediction_year, AVG(predicted_tax_rate) AS average_tax_rate FROM tax_predictions GROUP BY prediction_year HAVING AVG(predicted_tax_rate) > 0.5;
SELECT year, tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE tax_rate > 0.2 ORDER BY tax_rate DESC, year;
SELECT th.history_id, tr.year, tr.tax_rate, th.tax_category FROM tax_history th JOIN tax_rates tr ON th.year = tr.year WHERE th.tax_category = 'Income Taxes';

SELECT prediction_year, AVG(predicted_tax_rate) AS average_tax_rate, MAX(confidence_score) AS max_confidence FROM tax_predictions GROUP BY prediction_year HAVING MAX(confidence_score) > 0.8 ORDER BY average_tax_rate DESC, max_confidence DESC;
SELECT * FROM historical_tax_rates ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT tax_id, tax_rate FROM historical_tax_rates WHERE tax_rate > 0.2;
SELECT taxpayer_name, total_income FROM tax_payers WHERE total_income > 50000;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM tax_payments WHERE payment_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT year, trend_description FROM tax_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020;
SELECT * FROM historical_tax_rates ORDER BY year ASC
SELECT taxpayer_name, total_income FROM tax_payers WHERE total_income > 50000
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM tax_payments WHERE payment_amount < 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT * FROM tax_trends WHERE year = 2020
SELECT taxpayer_name, payment_amount FROM tax_payers JOIN tax_payments ON tax_payers.taxpayer_id = tax_payments.taxpayer_id
SELECT * FROM tax_rates;
SELECT tax_id, year, tax_rate FROM tax_rates WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT name, address FROM tax_payers WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT filing_status_id, status FROM tax_filing_status ORDER BY status DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM tax_payments WHERE payment_amount < 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM tax_rates WHERE year = 2021
SELECT taxpayer_id, name, income FROM tax_payers WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY income DESC
SELECT t.tax_id, t.tax_rate, p.payment_amount FROM tax_rates t JOIN tax_payments p ON t.tax_id = p.tax_id WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT tp.name, tp.address, tp.income, ts.status FROM tax_payers tp JOIN tax_filing_status ts ON tp.taxpayer_id = ts.filing_status_id
SELECT distinct year FROM tax_predictions WHERE predicted_tax_rate > 0.15 ORDER BY year ASC
